alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 11:27PM CST until November 29 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN ITAWAMBA AND EASTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 1126 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Detroit to 7 miles north of Caledonia, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1107 PM CST, a roof was blown off a home in Amory. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gattman, Sipsey Fork, New Hamilton, Quincy, Greenwood Springs, Splunge, Wise Gap and Athens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
